description: Try our easy to follow Asian Chicken & Noodle Stir-Fry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Noodle stir-fry,Seafood free,Broccoli,Tree nut free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Quick & easy dinner,Chicken,Easter,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Asian Chicken & Noodle Stir-Fry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 broccoli head, chopped into small florets
400g skinless chicken breast, sliced into thin strips

recipeInstructions.text: In a large glass bowl, combine honey, soy and 1 tbsp sunflower oil. Add chicken and refrigerate for at least 15 minutes to marinate.
Cook noodles according to packet instructions. Drain and set aside.

Heat 1 tbsp sunflower oil in a wok over medium heat. Add chicken and stir-fry for 5 minutes or until cooked through. Add broccoli and capsicum and and stir-fry for 2 minutes. Add carrot and stir-fry for a further 2 minutes.
Divide noodles between bowls and top with stir-fry mixture.
